class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Bless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#34ccff">God, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span style="color:#64ff90">breast </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">God, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">might </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword"
